CustomField.formula: IF (Cancelled__c = TRUE, IMAGE("/img/search_dismiss.gif", ""), IF (Delay_in_Minutes__c >= 60, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", ""), IF (Delay_in_Minutes__c <= 5, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", ""), IF (Delay_in_Minutes__c > 5, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", ""), IMAGE("/img/s.gif", "", 16, 16) ))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicator based on delay time: <=0 GREEN >0 and <60 AMBER >=60 RED Grey if cancelled
CustomField.label: On Time?
